segments.text: It looks delicious . I will order it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , sir , it's for 4 persons to have . I think it's too large for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please make it for a single person ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . We have never done that before .
segments.speaker: S2
